heading: HB06626
0:
AN ACT DECLARING OCTOBER 23 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BADOC IN THE PROVINCE OF ILOCOS NORTE IN COMMEMORATION OF THE BIRTH ANNIVERSARY OF JUAN N. LUNA, TO BE KNOWN AS
“JUAN LUNA DAY”
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2020-05-05
